text.section: Each local care team shall establish the terms of its members.
Each local care team shall select its chair from among its members for a designated term of office.

Each local care team:
shall determine which of its members will have responsibility for its administrative functions; and
if two or more members will share the responsibility, shall determine the rotation of the administrative functions.

Subject to the availability of funds, a parent or parent advocate who is a member of a local care team may receive:
the compensation provided in the State or local budget; and
reimbursement for expenses, in accordance with the Standard State Travel Regulations.
